values.ctor:
<init>(undeclaredThrowable: Throwable!)
            Constructs an UndeclaredThrowableException with the specified Throwable.

<init>(undeclaredThrowable: Throwable!, s: String!)
            Constructs an UndeclaredThrowableException with the specified Throwable and a detail message.

values.desc: Returns the Throwable instance wrapped in this UndeclaredThrowableException, which may be null.
